name: Clank Tank: AI Code Assistant
premise: SolBot Team presents AI Code Assistant, GPT-powered coding assistant for Solidity...
summary: SolBot Team pitches AI Code Assistant, a AI/Agents project that . The judges deliver 0 PUMPs, 4 DUMPs, and 0 YAWNs.

scenes.description: Introduction and pitch of AI Code Assistant

dialogue.line: Welcome to Clank Tank! Today we're evaluating AI Code Assistant, a AI/Agents project from the hackathon!

Our next project comes from the SolBot Team, who've created an AI Code Assistant that's about to make Solidity development a whole lot smoother! This GPT-powered coding companion is ready to help developers write smarter contracts faster. Let's see it in action!
Thanks Eliza! AI Code Assistant is GPT-powered coding assistant for Solidity We're solving .
Interesting. But how does this differ from existing solutions? What's your moat?
Great question!  sets us apart. We're not just another clone.

scenes.description: Eliza interviews the team about AI Code Assistant

dialogue.line: So tell me, what inspired you to build AI Code Assistant?
We saw that . Our team has the perfect background to tackle this.
What's been the biggest challenge so far?
Honestly? . But we're committed to making this work.

scenes.description: Final questions about AI Code Assistant

dialogue.line: Yo, but like, why would normies actually use this? Break it down for me.
Great point! . We've focused heavily on UX.
TELL ME WARRIOR - DO YOU HAVE THE STRENGTH TO CONQUER THIS MARKET OR WILL YOU FALL LIKE SO MANY BEFORE YOU?
We're in this for the long haul! Our tech stack includes TypeScript, Python, OpenAI API and we're ready to scale!
show me the github. i want to see commit history, not promises.
Absolutely! Check out https://github.com/solbot/assistant - we've been shipping consistently.
Alright, let's talk about AI Code Assistant. The business model is questionable at best, I don't see the path to revenue.
the github activity is a complete disaster. i've seen better commit messages from bootcamp grads.
Real talk though - would I use this? Hell no, this UI is giving 2010 energy.
THIS PROJECT IS WEAK AND SHALL PERISH! THE MARKET DEMANDS STRENGTH!

scenes.description: Final verdicts for AI Code Assistant

dialogue.line: Time for our judges to decide! Will AI Code Assistant get the funding they need? Judges, what say you?
Too many red flags in the business model. I have to DUMP this one.
this codebase is held together with prayers and duct tape. DUMP.
Nah fam, this ain't it. Big DUMP energy.
WEAK! PATHETIC! THIS PROJECT DIES IN THE ARENA! DUMP!
Ouch! 4 DUMPs! AI Code Assistant needs to go back to the drawing board!
